DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety effectiveness treatment tacrolimus biological agent .
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use-Results Survey Prograf Capsule Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study confirm safety 24 weeks-treatment combination tacrolimus + biological agent , ass efficacy use SDAI , CDAI , DAS28-CRP , MMP-3 , MHAQ patient rheumatoid arthritis achieve SDAI remission despite use biological agent 8 week .
DOC.criteria: patient rheumatoid arthritis treat biological agent 8 week achieve SDAI remission ( SDAI < 3.3 )
